description:
Promotion: Tribe Nine

The "Deadly Demo" is now playable on Steam! 
Add to your wishlist via the link below!
https://link.tribenine.tokyo/4f87yuK

◣◥◣◥◣◥◣◥◣ Latest Information ◥◣◥◣◥◣◥◣

【Official Tribe Nine X (formerly Twitter)】
https://x.com/tribenine_en

【Subscribe to the Official Tribe Nine Channel】
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7dm7tKQTtQ0sCcjw1JzOrw

【Official Tribe Nine Website】
https://tribenine.tokyo/

◣◥◣◥◣◥◣◥◣ Game Information ◥◣◥◣◥◣◥◣◥

▼ About the Game "Tribe Nine"
"Tribe Nine" is a Souls-like action RPG where you must discover strategies through repeated deaths as you face powerful enemies. The world and concept are created by the team behind the "Danganronpa" series.
Embark on a wild and exciting adventure with a cast of unique boys and girls in a meticulously crafted world with diverse art styles.

▼ Available Platforms
Steam® / iOS / Android

▼ Supported Languages
Japanese / English / Traditional Chinese / Simplified Chinese

© Akatsuki Games Inc.
#TribeNine #TRIBENINE #Steam #PR
